description: Computer science major and economics minor from Winter Springs, FL. Fall '12 AM class, BK 1935. Georgia Tech reminds me every day that I'd rather be in Florida but Lambda Chi and living in Atlanta makes all the hell worth it.
aspects: TUG, gamedays, networks, semiformal/formal, date nights, living in the house, the alumni, the AM program... I could go on for days, but the diversity in the house and the fact that every brother here has my back even though we're the largest fraternity on campus is what reminds me every day why I associated here.
quotes: "The only way to get rid of temptation is to yield to it. Resist it, and your soul grows sick with longing for the things it has forbidden to itself." - Oscar Wilde
name: Andrew Osborn
